item.title: [Basic] Kubernetes Commands (KR)
item.description: OS Mac OS Apple M1 Pro 13.4.1 reference https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubectl/cheatsheet/ install requirements 1 2 brew install kubectl brew install helm for cluster 1 2 brew install kind brew install minikube # you can choose one of them deploy cluster minikube 1 minikube start --cpus {n} --memory {m} # n = number of cores / m = size of memory (mb) kind 1 kind create cluster --image kindest/node:v1.

item.title: [Basic] Kubernetes Commands (KR)
item.description: OS Mac OS Apple M1 Pro 13.4.1 reference https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubectl/cheatsheet/ install requirements 1 2 brew install kubectl brew install helm for cluster 1 2 brew install kind brew install minikube # you can choose one of them deploy cluster minikube 1 minikube start --cpus {n} --memory {m} # n = number of cores / m = size of memory (mb) kind 1 kind create cluster --image kindest/node:v1.
